name: Ying Chao
story: Niu Lo is a seasoned soldier in the OPFOR army. He joined the army at a young age and has served for over two decades. He is well-respected among his peers for his disciplined approach to tasks and his unfaltering focus during missions. Niu Lo is married and has two children, whom he misses dearly while on deployment. He finds solace in his Buddhist faith, which gives him strength to endure the challenges of military service.
